WorkItem.ClosedComment: This can easily be done today, just create an external type System.Configuration.KeyValueConfigurationCollection and set it as the type on the attribute you want to be a KeyValueConfigurationCollection. Voilà, you have a KeyValueConfigurationCollection property ready for use. I don't see how adding this explicitly to the designer would make its use any better.
WorkItem.Description: Add the possibility to use collections like KeyValueConfigurationCollection.
